Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Wyoming.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to extend for three consecutive two-year periods, at the request of the FERC Swift Creek Power Company, Inc. project licensee, the deadline for commencement of construction of hydroelectric project number 1651 in the State of Wyoming.

titles.title: A bill to extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Wyoming.
